vote.title: Authorize the purchase of up to eight enclosed mobile heating, ventilation, and air conditioning trailer units for the Office of Emergency Management - RushCo Energy Specialists, Inc. in the amount of $300,073.04 and Western Shelter Systems in the amount of $98,875.28, lowest responsible bidder of two - Not to exceed $398,948.32 - Financing:  2019 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative 19-21 Fund
vote.description: Authorize the purchase of up to eight enclosed mobile heating, ventilation, and air conditioning trailer units for the Office of Emergency Management - RushCo Energy Specialists, Inc. in the amount of $300,073.04 and Western Shelter Systems in the amount of $98,875.28, lowest responsible bidder of two - Not to exceed $398,948.32 - Financing:  2019 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative 19-21 Fund
